question: I was just wondering if anyone knew if extreme emotional stress, could cause heart disease, diabetes, high blood pressure, and digestive disorders.  If so, if you get rid of some of those emotional stressors can you be cured from these heath issues, even if it is in your family genes?Also, if you are off your meds for hypo-thyroid for over 1 year, what health issues can it cause long term?
title: Stress and health
